title: Week 10 Waivers + Full Stream Ahead, Smells Like Hallelujah - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/9
description:
Week 10 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 10 waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, players to consider dropping, injury updates, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 9th, 2021.
 (01:30) - Monday Night Recap
 (12:00) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (19:15) - NFL News
 (25:15) - Waivers
 (25:40) - WR Waivers
 (38:20) - RB Waivers
 (49:15) - TE Waivers
 (54:35) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
